scriptedContentFragment.name: ${resource:Widget_Name}
scriptedContentFragment.contentScript:
$core_v2_page.AddLink('stylesheet', $core_v2_widget.GetExecutedFileUrl('style.less'), "%{ Position = 'AfterTheme' }") #set($collection = $articles_v1_articleCollections.Current) #set($tabsContainerId = $core_v2_widget.UniqueId('tabsContainer')) #set($writeTabId = $core_v2_widget.UniqueId('writeTab')) #set($optionsTabId = $core_v2_widget.UniqueId('optionsTab')) #set($helpfulnessTabId = $core_v2_widget.UniqueId('helpfulnessTab')) #set($historyTabId = $core_v2_widget.UniqueId('historyTab')) #set($article = false) #set($article = $articles_v1_articles.Current) #set($canOrder = false) #set($publishGroup = false) #if ($core_v2_page.GetQueryStringValue('publishGroupId')) #set($publishGroup = $articles_v1_publishGroups.Get($core_v2_utility.ParseInt($core_v2_page.GetQueryStringValue('publishGroupId')))) #if ($publishGroup.HasErrors()) #set($publishGroup = false) #end #end #set($temporaryDataJson = false) #set($temporaryDataId = false) #set($temporaryDataId = $core_v2_page.GetQueryStringValue('tid')) #if ($temporaryDataId) #set($temporaryDataJson = $core_v2_utility.ParseJson($core_v2_utility.GetTemporaryData($temporaryDataId))) #if ($temporaryDataJson) #set($temporaryDataJson = $core_v2_utility.ToJson($temporaryDataJson)) #end #end #set($permissionContext = "%{ ApplicationId = $collection.ApplicationId, ApplicationTypeId = $articles_v1_articleCollections.ApplicationTypeId }") #if($article) $permissionContext.Add('ContentId', $article.ContentId) $permissionContext.Add('ContentTypeId', $articles_v1_articles.ContentTypeId) #if (!$core_v3_permission.CheckPermission($articles_v1_permissions.EditArticles, $core_v2_user.Accessing.Id, $permissionContext).IsAllowed) $core_v2_widget.Hide() #end #set($canOrder = $core_v3_permission.CheckPermission($articles_v1_permissions.ManageArticleOrdering, $core_v2_user.Accessing.Id, $permissionContext).IsAllowed) #elseif(!$core_v3_permission.CheckPermission($articles_v1_permissions.CreateArticles, $core_v2_user.Accessing.Id, $permissionContext).IsAllowed) $core_v2_widget.Hide() #else #set($canOrder = $core_v3_permission.CheckPermission($articles_v1_permissions.ManageArticleOrdering, $core_v2_user.Accessing.Id, $permissionContext).IsAllowed) #end #set($hasPublishGroups = false) #if ($articles_v1_publishGroups.List($collection.Id, "%{ PageSize = 1, PageIndex = 0, IsPublished = '' }").Count > 0) #set($hasPublishGroups = true) #end #if ($hasPublishGroups)
#end #if ($article) #set ($heading = $article.Title) #else #set ($heading = $core_v2_language.FormatString($core_v2_language.GetResource('NewArticle'), $collection.Name)) #end

$heading

#set ($versionTemplateId = $core_v2_widget.UniqueId('versionTemplateId')) #set ($orderingTemplateId = $core_v2_widget.UniqueId('orderingTemplateId'))
  • $core_v2_language.GetResource('Type_Description') #set($typeHtml = '')
  • $core_v2_language.GetResource('Categories_Description')

$core_v2_language.GetResource('Notifications')

  • $core_v2_language.GetResource('SuppressNotifications_Description')

$core_v2_language.GetResource('Scheduling_Heading')

  • $core_v2_language.GetResource('PublishGroup_Description')
    • #end
  • $core_v2_language.GetResource('PublishDate_Description')
  • $core_v2_language.GetResource('PublishEndDate_Description')

$core_v2_language.GetResource('Ordering_Heading')

$core_v2_language.GetResource('Meta_Heading')

  • $core_v2_language.GetResource('Meta_TitleDescription')
  • $core_v2_language.GetResource('Meta_KeywordsDescription')
  • $core_v2_language.GetResource('Meta_DescriptionDescription')

$core_v2_language.GetResource('Helpfulness_Instructions')

#if ($hasPublishGroups) #end
$core_v2_language.GetResource('Header_Version') $core_v2_language.GetResource('Header_PublishedDate') $core_v2_language.GetResource('Header_UnpublishedDate')$core_v2_language.GetResource('Header_PublishGroup')
  • $core_v2_language.GetResource('History_ClearSelection') $core_v2_language.GetResource('History_View') $core_v2_language.GetResource('History_Open') $core_v2_language.GetResource('History_ViewChanges') $core_v2_language.GetResource('History_Delete') $core_v2_language.GetResource('History_Undelete')
  • $core_v2_language.GetResource('SaveDraft') $core_v2_language.GetResource('SavePublish') $core_v2_language.GetResource('Cancel')
#registerEndOfPageHtml('telligent.evolution.widgets.articleCreateEdit') #end #registerEndOfPageHtml() #end
